00018 ChatViewPrivate::ChatViewPrivate(ChatView* qq)
00019     : QObject(),
00020     _q(qq)
00021 {
00022     KEmoticons emotes;
00023     emoTheme = emotes.theme();
00024     qsrand(std::time(0));
00025     doc.reset(new QDomDocument(QLatin1String("html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.1//EN\""
00026         "    \"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml11/DTD/xhtml11.dtd\"")));
00027     createShell();
00028 }
00029 
00030 QString
00031 ChatViewPrivate::createShell()
00032 {
00033     QDomElement html = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("html"));
00034     html.setAttribute(QLatin1String("xmlns"), QLatin1String("http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"));
00035     html.setAttribute(QLatin1String("lang"), QLatin1String("en"));
00036     html.setAttribute(QLatin1String("xml:lang"), QLatin1String("en"));
00037     QDomElement head = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("head"));
00038     QDomElement title = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("title"));
00039     title.appendChild(doc->createTextNode(QLatin1String("Aki IRC Client")));
00040     QDomElement metaCT = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("meta"));
00041     metaCT.setAttribute(QLatin1String("http-equiv"), QLatin1String("Content-Type"));
00042     metaCT.setAttribute(QLatin1String("content"), QLatin1String("application/xhtml+xml; charset=UTF-8"));
00043     QDomElement metaAC = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("meta"));
00044     metaAC.setAttribute(QLatin1String("http-equiv"), QLatin1String("Accept-Content"));
00045     metaAC.setAttribute(QLatin1String("content"), QLatin1String("utf-8"));
00046     head.appendChild(title);
00047     head.appendChild(metaCT);
00048     head.appendChild(metaAC);
00049     QDomElement body = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("body"));
00050     body.appendChild(log(messageTime(), QString()));
00051     html.appendChild(head);
00052     html.appendChild(body);
00053 
00054     doc->appendChild(html);
00055     _q->setContent(doc->toByteArray(4), QLatin1String("application/xhtml+xml"));
00056     doc->clear();
00057     return QString();
00058 }
00059 
00060 QString
00061 ChatViewPrivate::unescape(const QString& str)
00062 {
00063     QString tmp = str;
00064     tmp.replace(QLatin1String("&gt;"), QLatin1String(">"));
00065     tmp.replace(QLatin1String("&lt;"), QLatin1String("<"));
00066     tmp.replace(QLatin1String("&amp;"), QLatin1String("&"));
00067     return tmp;
00068 }

00070 QWebFrame*
00071 ChatViewPrivate::mainFrame()
00072 {
00073     return _q->page()->mainFrame();
00074 }
00075 
00076 void
00077 ChatViewPrivate::appendMessage(const QString& message)
00078 {
00079     const int maxVert = mainFrame()->scrollBarMaximum(Qt::Vertical);
00080     const int value = mainFrame()->scrollBarValue(Qt::Vertical);
00081 
00082     userMoved = (maxVert == value) ? true : false;
00083 
00084     QWebElement log = mainFrame()->findFirstElement(QLatin1String("body log"));
00085     Q_ASSERT(log.isNull());
00086     log.appendInside(unescape(message));
00087 }
00088 
00089 void
00090 ChatViewPrivate::appendMessage(const QDomElement& element)
00091 {
00092     doc->appendChild(element);
00093     appendMessage(doc->toString(4));
00094     doc->clear();
00095 }

00097 QString
00098 ChatViewPrivate::convertEmotes(const QString& str)
00099 {
00100     return parseEmoticons(str, KEmoticonsTheme::StrictParse);
00101 }

00103 QString
00104 ChatViewPrivate::messageTime() const
00105 {
00106     // TODO Change this to deal with themes in xsl
00107     QTime time = KDateTime::currentLocalTime();
00108     QString timeStr = KGlobal::locale()->formatLocaleTime(time);
00109     return timeStr;
00110 }

00112 QString
00113 ChatViewPrivate::stripHtml(const QString& message) const
00114 {
00115     QString msg = message;
00116     msg.replace(QRegExp(QLatin1String("<[^>]*>")), QLatin1String(""));
00117     return msg;
00118 }

00120 void
00121 ChatViewPrivate::contentsSizeChanged(const QSize& size)
00122 {
00123     if (!userMoved) {
00124         mainFrame()->scroll(size.width(), size.height());
00125     }
00126 }

00128 QString
00129 ChatViewPrivate::parseEmoticons(const QString& message, KEmoticonsTheme::ParseMode mode,
00130                                 const QStringList& excludes) const
00131 {
00132     // Exact code from parseEmoticons in parseEmoticons()
00133     // Juse added function to add file:// to the path because WebKit won't
00134     // load them without it.
00135     QList<KEmoticonsTheme::Token> tokens =
00136         emoTheme.tokenize(message, mode | KEmoticonsTheme::SkipHTML);
00137     if (tokens.isEmpty() && !message.isEmpty()) {
00138         return message;
00139     }
00140 
00141     QString result;
00142 
00143     foreach (const KEmoticonsTheme::Token& token, tokens) {
00144         switch (token.type) {
00145         case KEmoticonsTheme::Text: {
00146             result += token.text;
00147             break;
00148         }
00149         case KEmoticonsTheme::Image: {
00150             if (!excludes.contains(token.text)) {
00151                 result += token.picHTMLCode;
00152             } else {
00153                 result += token.text;
00154             }
00155             break;
00156         }
00157         default: {
00158             kWarning() << "Unknown token type. Something's broken.";
00159             break;
00160         }
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00164     result.replace(QLatin1String("src=\""), QLatin1String("src\"file://"));
00165     return result;
00166 }

00171     KToolInvocation::invokeBrowser(url.url());

00173 
00174 void
00175 ChatViewPrivate::customContextMenuRequested(const QPoint& pos)
00176 {
00177     QWebHitTestResult hit = mainFrame()->hitTestContent(pos);
00178     if (hit.isNull()) {
00179         return;
00180     }
00181 
00182     if (hit.linkElement().tagName() == QLatin1String("A") &&
00183         hit.linkElement().hasAttribute(QLatin1String("href"))) {
00184         KUrl url(hit.linkUrl());
00185         QString href = url.url().remove(QLatin1String("about:blank"));
00186 
00187         if (href[0] == QLatin1Char('#')) {
00188             emit _q->userUrlClicked(href.remove(QLatin1Char('#')));
00189         } else {
00190             QMenu* menu = new QMenu(_q);
00191             menu->setTitle(i18n("Normal"));
00192 
00193             QAction* action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-copy")),
00194                                           i18n("Copy Link Address"), menu);
00195             connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00196                     SLOT(copyUrlTriggered()));
00197             menu->addAction(action);
00198 
00199             action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("document-save-as")),
00200                                  i18n("Save Link As..."), menu);
00201             connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00202                     SLOT(saveAsTriggered()));
00203             menu->addAction(action);
00204             menu->exec(QCursor::pos());
00205         }
00206     } else {
00207         QMenu* menu = new QMenu(_q);
00208 
00209         QAction* action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-copy")),
00210                                             i18n("Copy"), menu);
00211         connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00212                 SLOT(copyTriggered()));
00213         menu->addAction(action);
00214 
00215         action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-find")),
00216                              i18n("Find Text..."), menu);
00217         connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00218                 SLOT(findTextTriggered()));
00219         menu->addAction(action);
00220         menu->addSeparator();
00221 
00222         action = new QAction(i18n("Channel Topic History..."),
00223                              menu);
00224         connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00225                 SLOT(topicHistoryTriggered()));
00226         menu->addAction(action);
00227 
00228         menu->exec(QCursor::pos());
00229     }
00230 }

00232 void
00233 ChatViewPrivate::copyUrlTriggered()
00234 {
00235     QClipboard* cb = KApplication::clipboard();
00236     cb->setText(_q->page()->selectedText(), QClipboard::Clipboard);
00237 }
00238 
00239 void
00240 ChatViewPrivate::saveAsTriggered()
00241 {
00242     KUser user(KUser::UseEffectiveUID);
00243     const QString fileName = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName(user.homeDir(), QString(), _q,
00244                                                           i18n("Save As..."),
00245                                                           KFileDialog::ConfirmOverwrite);
00246     KIO::file_copy(_q->page()->selectedText(), fileName);
00247 }

00253 }

00261 QString
00262 ChatViewPrivate::randomString() const
00263 {
00264     static const char alphanum[] =
00265         "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
00266 
00267     QString str;
00268     for (int i = 0; i < 11; ++i) {
00269         str.append(QLatin1Char(alphanum[qrand() % (sizeof(alphanum) - 1)]));
00270     }
00271 
00272     return str;
00273 }

00275 QString
00276 ChatViewPrivate::span(const QString& klass, const QString& text)
00277 {
00278     QDomElement element = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("span"));
00279     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("class"), klass);
00280     element.appendChild(doc->createTextNode(text));
00281     doc->appendChild(element);
00282     QString str = doc->toString(4);
00283     doc->clear();
00284     return str;
00285 }

00287 QDomElement
00288 ChatViewPrivate::createEvent(const QString& name)
00289 {
00290     QDomElement element = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("event"));
00291     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("id"), randomString());
00292     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("name"), name);
00293     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("occurred"), messageTime());
00294     return element;
00295 }

00315 QDomElement
00316 ChatViewPrivate::by(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const QString& klass, bool self)
00317 {
00318     QDomText text = doc->createTextNode(sender.nick());
00319     QDomElement element = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("by"));
00320 
00321     if (self) {
00322         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("self"), QLatin1String("yes"));
00323     }
00324 
00325     if (!klass.isEmpty() && !klass.isNull()) {
00326         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("class"), klass);
00327     }
00328 
00329     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("hostmask"), sender.hostmask());
00330     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("identifier"), sender.user());
00331     element.appendChild(text);
00332     return element;
00333 }

00340         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("ignored"), QLatin1String("yes"));
00341     }
00342     return element;

00354 QDomElement
00355 ChatViewPrivate::message(const QString& msg, bool highlight, bool action, bool notice)
00356 {
00357     QDomText text = doc->createTextNode(msg);
00358     QDomElement element = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("message"));
00359 
00360     if (highlight) {
00361         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("highlight"), QLatin1String("yes"));
00362     }
00363     if (action) {
00364         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("action"), QLatin1String("yes"));
00365     }
00366     if (notice) {
00367         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("type"), QLatin1String("notice"));
00368     }
00369     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("received"), messageTime());
00370     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("id"), randomString());
00371     element.appendChild(text);
00372     return element;
00373 }

00393 QDomElement
00394 ChatViewPrivate::sender(const QString& nickname, const QString& username,
00395                         const QString& hostmask, const QString& klass, bool self,
00396                         const QString& buddy)
00397 {
00398     QDomText text = doc->createTextNode(nickname);
00399     QDomElement element = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("sender"));
00400     element.appendChild(text);
00401     if (!buddy.isEmpty() && !buddy.isNull()) {
00402         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("buddy"), buddy);
00403     }
00404 
00405     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("hostmask"), hostmask);
00406     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("identifier"), username);
00407 
00408     if (self) {
00409         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("self"), QLatin1String("yes"));
00410     }
00411 
00412     if (!klass.isEmpty() && !klass.isNull()) {
00413         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("class"), klass);
00414     }
00415 
00416     return element;
00417 }

00428 QDomElement
00429 ChatViewPrivate::who(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, bool self,
00430                      const QString& klass)
00431 {

00433     QDomElement element = doc->createElement(QLatin1String("who"));
00434 
00435     if (!klass.isEmpty() && !klass.isNull()) {
00436         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("class"), klass);
00437     }
00438 
00439     if (self) {
00440         element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("self"), QLatin1String("yes"));
00441     }
00442 
00443     element.setAttribute(QLatin1String("hostmask"), sender.hostmask());
00444     element.appendChild(text);
00445     return element;
